name: Bug Hunt (HenryBell)
description:
Overview:

'Bug Hunt' is a top down shooter that incorporates rogue-like and procedural generation elements. You control a small battle drone that is on a pest control mission to rid the underground vaults of their giant bug inhabitants.

The game was developed in Unity over the course of several weeks for round 2 of the Sumo Digital - Rising Star 2017 coding competition. All art assets were produced in GIMP.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move drone
  • Mouse - Move crosshair
  • Left Mouse Click - Use weapon

Contact:

Find me and my other projects at my website: HenryBell.net
